game.name: A Night Duty
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 어느 군 부대의 당직사관이 되어, 당신은 끝나지 않는 순찰을 돌게 됩니다. 이 영원한 밤을 끝내기 위해, 여러 이상현상들을 찾아내어 조각난 이야기를 맞춰보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your duty as a South Korean army officer just began. You must check out mysterious anomalies to finish this endless night.

reviewHighlights.text: Thanks for a really good game. Got me in my feels though. The meaning behind this anomaly observation indie horror game is deep. It's a dark story. Bu...
Honestly, i was thinking about leaving a bad review for this one, but somehow i was entertained enough to keep playing until i saw all anomalies. You...
